extension.summary: The official YouTube channel of Weather Watch NZ
extension.description: The latest Weather Video forecasts for New Zealand covering cyclones, snow, floods, drought and everything else Mother Nature throws at us. Head weather forecaster Philip Duncan brings you the latest weather forecast weekdays, and special breaking news weather videos for New Zealand during the big events. With our connects through Bauer Global Media, CNN Weather, CountryTV and Wunderground we have the data and information to have you covered weatherwise.
